cause.description:
Get Max Weinberg put into the hall of fame!!
He is an amazing drummer and has played on the set of Late Night for years on NBC
Weinberg rose to success as the drummer for Bruce Springsteen's E Street Band, joining in 1974 after answering a newspaper ad that famously requested "no junior Ginger Bakers" in reference to Baker's long drum solo reputation. Weinberg's consistent beat solved the E Street Band's drumming instabilities.
1. Max Weinberg is amazing
2. Max Weinberg is a pimp
3. Max Weinberg is the man
cause.mission: Get Max Weinberg put into the hall of fame
cause.name: Max Weinberg for the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
